Jax.name: JaxБ
Jax.title: БбGrandmaster at ArmsбБ
Jax.lore:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзIt is seldom the case where a champion is defined by his actions after joining the League of Legends rather than before. Such is the case with Jax, for whom the argument could be made that he is the most prolific tournament fighter currently at the Institute of War. Before joining the League, Jax was an unremarkable soldier-for-hire. For reasons known only to the former leader of the League, High Councilor Reginald Ashram, Jax was put on the top of the list of candidates to receive a League Judgment - the interview process that either accepts or rejects a prospective champion. His Judgment was the quickest in League history, where the Doors of Acceptance glowed and slowly swung open as soon as it began. Jax faced no recorded Observation or Reflection during his Judgment.зЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюJax proved himself to be an immediate terror in the Fields of Justice. The self-proclaimed ''Armsmaster of the League'' rattled off a streak of consecutive wins that to this day has not been matched. A number of summoners in the League grew concerned that the perceived objectivity of the League of Legends would be questioned by the presence of an unknown fighter who was unbeatable. For this reason, the new leader of the League (following Reginald Ashram's disappearance), High Councilor Heyward Relivash, created special restrictions for Jax to fight under. This was something the League had never done before, and something that has never been done since. The burly fighter responded by imposing his own special conditions; as a means of protest, he permitted himself to fight using only a brass lamppost. Neither the League's sanctions nor his own has affected his winning ways. The League has since rescinded its sanctions, but Jax has not; he fights and fights well with his trusty brass lamppost.ЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗз''Be advised - there has been an outbreak of lamppost-shaped bruises in the League of Legends.''ЗжЖдДгГбБ
Б-- GragasБ
Jax.blurb: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзIt is seldom the case where a champion is defined by his actions after joining the League of Legends rather than before. Such is the case with Jax, for whom the argument ...
allytips: БбГгДдЖжЗзJax can Leap Strike to friendly units, including wards. You can use them to plan your escape.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙJax benefits greatly from items that have both Ability Power and Attack Damage such as Guinsoo's Rageblade and Hextech Gunblade.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
enemytips: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлTry to engage him in short bursts instead of going toe-to-toe with him. Preventing him from attacking consecutively drastically lowers his damage output.ЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлJax can dodge all incoming attacks for a very short amount of time and stuns enemies in melee range when it ends. Wait to strike him until after his dodge is finished.ПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БLeap StrikeБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжJax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.жЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгJax leaps to a target unit, dealing ГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }})БбГг physical damage if it is an enemy.ГбБ

spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗJax's charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгДдЖжЗзJax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next basic attack or Leap Strike to deal an additional ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Ббmagic damage.Б

spells.name: БбCounter StrikeБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйJax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack stunning all surrounding enemies.ЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгДдЖжЗзJax enters a defensive stance for up to 2 seconds, dodging all incoming basic attacks and taking ЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e3 }}БбГг% less damage from area effect abilities.гГбБ

БбГгДдЖжAfter 2 seconds or if activated again, Jax stuns surrounding enemies for ЖдДгГбБ{{ e2 }}Бб second and deals бБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})Бб physical damage to them.ГбБ

БбCounter Strike deals бБ{{ e5 }}БбГг% more damage for each attack Jax dodged (max: ДгГбБ{{ e4 }}Бб% increased damage).бБ

spells.name: БбGrandmaster's MightбБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФEvery third consecutive attack deals additional magic damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.ФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

passive.name: БбRelentless AssaultбБ
